calculateFlag.title: Calculate flag
calculateFlag.description: Transforms the pulse into liter if set. Needs a command to be active.

alarm.title: Alarm
alarm.description: Equals true if the alarm is triggered.

currentWaterConsumption.title: Current water consumption
currentWaterConsumption.description: Current water consumption in liters with the transformation.

totalWaterConsumption.title: Total water consumption
totalWaterConsumption.description: Total water consumption in liters with the transformation.

relativePulse.title: Relative pulse
relativePulse.description: Pulses detected between the last event and now.

totalPulse.title: Total pulse
totalPulse.description: Total of pulses detected since reset.
